hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found in #the Market#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Map of the Water Temple#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Iron Boots#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that there is an alcove with a Recovery Heart behind the lava wall in Dodongo's Cavern.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Goron Ruby#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Sun's Song# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #time#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.
